name: Impact Trial: Simulation [Demo]
description:
Impact Trial: Simulation is a shoot 'em up and narrative adventure videogame where we will be in the shoes of a novice who joins a program to save his planet.

Impact Trial: Simulation combines two genres in one: the frenetic action of shoot 'em up - bullet hells over 6 levels and a story worthy of modern adventure narratives.

Main Features

  • Story mode where decisions matter.
  • Combat will be challenging with a variety of enemies.
  • Hidden modes when the story ends.
  • 2D PixelArt aesthetic.
  • Original retro soundtrack.
  • Available with Keyboard and ControlPad.

if you like the demo, add the game to your steam wishlist and share it with more people who like video games.
